shorten_this.description: The context menu option to shorten the right-clicked item.

shorten_any.description: The context menu option to shorten any URL.

shorten_tab.description: The context menu option to shorten the current tab URL.

expand_this.description: The context menu option to expand the right-clicked item.

expand_any.description: The context menu option to expand any URL.

ajax_error.description: The error shown to the user when an unknown error occurs.

ajax_timeout.description: The error shown to the user when a timeout occurs.

ajax_parsererror.description: The error shown to the user when a parser error occurs.

internal_error.description: The error shown to the user when an exception occurs.

invalid_url.description: The error shown to the user when the input URL is invalid.

successful_shorten_prompt.message: Successfully shortened URL using $SERVICE$. Click OK to copy the URL to the clipboard.
successful_shorten_prompt.description: Shown in a popup to the user when a URL is successfully shortened via the context menu.

failed_shorten_prompt.message: An error occured while shortening URL using $SERVICE$.
failed_shorten_prompt.description: Shown in a popup to the user when a URL is unsuccessfully shortened via the context menu.

successful_expand_prompt.message: Successfully expanded URL using $SERVICE$. Click OK to open the URL in a new tab.
successful_expand_prompt.description: Shown in a popup to the user when a URL is successfully expanded via the context menu.

failed_expand_prompt.message: An error occured while expanding URL using $SERVICE$.
failed_expand_prompt.description: Shown in a popup to the user when a URL is unsuccessfully expanded via the context menu.

original_url.description: Shown above the original URL in popups from context menu.

prompt_shorten_url.message: Insert the URL you wish to shorten using $SERVICE$.
prompt_shorten_url.description: Shown in a popup where the user inserts the URL to shorten.

popup_list_header.description: The small help string shown above the service list in the popup.

popup_current_tab.description: The current tab button-thing in the URL input in the popup.

popup_from_clipboard.description: The from clipboard button-thing in the URL input in the popup.

popup_shorten_with.description: The button text for shortening services.

popup_expand_with.description: The button text for expanding services.

try_another_url.description: The 'Try another URL' link in the popup.

try_another_service.description: The 'Try another service' link in the popup.

expandurl_error_OK.description: Error shown when the user tries to expand something that doesn't redirect anywhere.

expandurl_error_InvalidURL.description: Error shown when the user tries to expand something that doesn't exist.

expandurl_error_InternalError.description: Error shown when ExpandURL has an internal error.
